original_title: 神さまのいない日曜日 第13話 「記憶」
overview: A special OAV of Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi, included in the final Blu-ray/DVD volume of the series.  This bonus OAV is separated into three parts:  - In the first part, taking place before the characters reach Ostia, Ai and the others visit a hot spring.  - In the second part, Alice remembers the times he killed his classmates and encounters Hampnie Hambart. A battle ensues.  - In the third and final part, Hampnie dreams of when he first met Hana and is then woken up by Ai.
title: Sunday Without God: Memories
